Look below the "o" on the back...I think that's it [emoji51]

[quote name="Sportsguy20" post=1383435]Maybe I am blind, but  I don't see the pinhole.  (Is it super small)?[/QUOTE]

Yes, it's the size of a pin! :cool:

Sorry man, no offense, couldn't resist!

Peace, Mike
the PH is actually above the middle 1 in the number "111". the thing below the o in "No" is a period.

Thanks everyone for your help.  I SEE it now
:cool:
